content: elevate your space with the big bold chevron curtain crochet pattern this easy-level project features a striking chevron/flame stitch design that adds a touch of modern elegance to any room the pattern includes detailed instructions for creating a reversible mesh curtain worked flat in one piece from the top down with customizable sizing options you can tailor this curtain to fit your space perfectly whether you follow the written pattern or use the helpful video tutorial this project is perfect for crocheters looking to add a pop of color and texture to their home decor **unique features-** easy-level project for all skill levels chevron/flame stitch design adds modern flair reversible mesh pattern so it looks great from inside and out one-piece construction for seamless finish top-down construction for easy customization written pattern and video tutorial for guidance stripes/colorwork option to customize your decor **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn red heart with love https //amzn to/46ylulh solids aran weight 375-1000 yards
